sentence_a: The Contractor shall provide all labor, materials, and equipment for the engineering, procurement, fabrication, and testing of one (1) Hydrogen Injection Skid. The goal of this project is to provide high-pressure hydrogen enrichment to the main turbine feed line.
sentence_b: Regional Standards: All components must strictly comply with Eurocode 3 and the Pressure Equipment Directive (PED).
